name: Curse of the Car(ystals)
description:
As someone down on his luck the main character sets off to pursue crystals nearby. Little does he know that upon collection of these special crystals does it turn the collector into a car. To get rid of the curse you must recollect the crystals but this time as a car. Can you make it through this platformer normally and as a car? Find out here!

Dev - Nicolas Ming

Note- I ran out of time for this jam and would have loved to give this the time it deserves. sounds, music, better levels, skymap.
